results.title: Ethics and the Media
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Journalism Resource Tapes”.
Creighton Burns, Editor of the Age and Harry Gordon, former Editor in Chief of the Herald and Weekly Times, discuss issues relating to journalism’s code of ethics. They discuss what their in-house rules are relating to ethics and integrity within their journalistic world.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Journalism Resource Tapes”.
Creighton Burns, Editor of the Age and Harry Gordon, former Editor in Chief of the Herald and Weekly Times, discuss issues relating to journalism’s code of ethics. They discuss what their in-house rules are relating to ethics and integrity within their journalistic world.
description_for_label:
Episode of Series “Journalism Resource Tapes”.

results.title: Electrical fitting and installation
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film. Shows the installation and maintenance of electrical equipment by electrical fitters and mechanics. Discusses the opportunities in this field in Australia.

results.title: Clerical work
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
This is a field of work with many opportunities: secretaries, optometrists, general clerks, receptionists, bank teller, enquiry clerk, accountant and section head. Shows that with machines performing the monotonous jobs, todays office work is concerned more with planning and people. Part of the “Is this your career?”series.
results.description:

results.title: Motor vehicle trades
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Deals with the trade of the panel beater, and also shows the work of the vehicle trimmer and the vehicle painter. Discusses apprenticeship details and training required.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.

results.title: Aircraft maintenance
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”
Discusses general overhaul maintenance of aircraft, whether it be commercial, passer or light aircraft. Includes TAA, Qantas, East-West, Cessner airlines. Also talks about testing and checking procedures and what the engineer should be looking for; the role of the engineer and qualifications required for this career.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”
Discusses general overhaul maintenance of aircraft, whether it be commercial, passer or light aircraft. Includes TAA, Qantas, East-West, Cessner airlines. Also talks about testing and checking procedures and what the engineer should be looking for; the role of the engineer and qualifications required for this career.
description_for_label:

results.title: Law
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing the different responsibilities carried by the barrister and the solicitor. Discusses opportunities available in the practice of law, including services to business and commerce.

results.title: Textile technician
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”
Complex machinery is necessary at the various levels of textile manufacture. Follows the raw cotton through the spinning mill as it is processed into yarn. Then to the knitting mill, where yarn is woven into knitted garments. In the weaving mill, entirely different processes are carried out by different machines. Throughout the film, textile technicians are seen servicing this specialised machinery, some of which can tie the ends of broken yarn together again.
results.description:

results.title: Matrix
results.brief_description: Another of John Whitney’s important investigations into technology and the moving image, this particularly geometric animated abstraction uses industrial computers to render Whitney’s light musical forms onto the screen. Computer generated forms evolve, merge and subdivide on a black background, each motion and movement as carefully orchestrated and synthesised as the accompanying music.
results.description: Another of John Whitney’s important investigations into technology and the moving image, this particularly geometric animated abstraction uses industrial computers to render Whitney’s light musical forms onto the screen. Computer generated forms evolve, merge and subdivide on a black background, each motion and movement as carefully orchestrated and synthesised as the accompanying music.
